Posts.Content: carola58 wrote: I just found out that I have have a 5cm tumor (possibly other smaller ones,too that wouldn't show on petscan). I have stage 4 bone mets only. Currently on letrozole/ibrance. There seems to be a split of opinion whether a dmx would make any sense now. I realize it won't change the eventual outcome but there seem to be some opinions that removing the "cancer factory" might reduce total tumor load and extend time. Has anybody here made a decision in this situation either pro or con dmx? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Bone mets + new tumor, does a mastectomy still makes sense? carola58
